ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: ... when you head from the city to Shadeweaver s, just when the bridge ends, turn to the right, but stay close to the wall. you should be able to go up and
ygData.messageBody:
> now. How do I get into the crater and out of it without having to
> fall in and get killed to return tothe city? I'm starting my hunt for
> the three requested bare skinned rock hoppers.

when you head from the city to Shadeweaver's, just when the bridge
ends, turn to the right, but stay close to the wall. you should be able
to go up and down there.

you should also memo the locations of guards in the crater, because
you can train mobs on them; but be careful not to train on other players
resting there!


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
